text:
I rank 28 AI tools from S to F.

This will make some of you (very) angry:

âœ¦Â Â ğ—¦ ğ—§ğ—œğ—˜ğ—¥Â Â âœ¦ 

Wispr Flow - wispr.ai
â˜‘ Write text with your voice.
â˜‘ Insanely fast and accurate.
â˜‘ Keeps on training on your edits.

Gamma - gamma.app
â˜‘ Make slides, with AI.
â˜‘ The best PowerPoint killer.
â˜‘ Unmatched taste in their designs. 

âœ¦Â Â ğ—” ğ—§ğ—œğ—˜ğ—¥Â Â âœ¦ 

Midjourney - midjourney.com
â˜‘ The best AI to make images.
â˜‘ Artistically miles away from any AI.
â˜‘ Started to make videos from images.

Opus Clip - opus.pro
â˜‘ My personal video editor.
â˜‘ Upload a YouTube link, get clips.
â˜‘ Create 20-50x TikToks from one video.

Blink - blink.new
â˜‘ My favorite vibecoding AI.
â˜‘ Made for people who don't code.
â˜‘ Prompt it like ChatGPT, build apps.

Claude - claude.ai
â˜‘ A ChatGPT alternative.
â˜‘ The best at creative writing.
â˜‘ Feels different, but feels good.

âœ¦Â Â ğ—• ğ—§ğ—œğ—˜ğ—¥Â Â âœ¦ 

Perplexity - perplexity.ai
â˜‘ The one AI made to search.
â˜‘ It has most of the LLMs inside, like ChatGPT.
â˜‘ I like the "Discover" tab, a better Google News.

NotebookLM - notebooklm.google.com
â˜‘ A great AI to upload courses and learn.
â˜‘ Create a podcast, quizzes, or mindmaps.
â˜‘ Can take up to 50 sources, even from YouTube.

Granola - granola.ai
â˜‘ The best AI meeting notetaker.
â˜‘ Made for simplicity and efficiency.
â˜‘ One of the few that does NOT connect to the call.

Gemini - gemini.google.com
â˜‘ The Google alternative to ChatGPT.
â˜‘ Not great at search and text, but the best at...
â˜‘ ... images (Nano-Banana-Pro) or videos (Veo-3).

âœ¦Â Â ğ—– ğ—§ğ—œğ—˜ğ—¥Â Â âœ¦ 

Canva â€“ canva.com
â˜‘ Underwhelming AI features.
â˜‘ I'm expecting them to get better?
â˜‘ The most known non-designer design tool.

ElevenLabs â€“ elevenlabs.io
â˜‘ The best AI for voices, period.
â˜‘ They started to make songs too.
â˜‘ Still a bit technical, will get mainstream.

EasyGen - easygen.io
â˜‘ An AI to write on Linkedin.
â˜‘ I grew 5x accounts with this.
â˜‘ Take a winning post, replicate it.

Suno â€“ suno.ai
â˜‘ The best AI for music.
â˜‘ Prompt it like ChatGPT, get music.
â˜‘ They are getting sued, but I think they'll win.

âœ¦Â Â ğ—— ğ—§ğ—œğ—˜ğ—¥Â Â âœ¦ 

Grok - grok.com 
â˜‘ The ChatGPT alternative from Elon Musk.
â˜‘ The best to search tweets, and that's nice.
â˜‘ Still not ChatGPT level, but they grow (very) fast.

âœ¦Â Â ğ—˜ ğ—§ğ—œğ—˜ğ—¥Â Â âœ¦ 

DeepSeek â€“ deepseek.com
â˜‘ The Chinese ChatGPT, for free.
â˜‘ They went from super popular to... dead?

Pika - pika.art
â˜‘ A video model with AI.
â˜‘ Underwhelming after big promises.

Otter â€“ otter.ai
â˜‘ The most famous meeting notetaker?
â˜‘ I find it annoying to have it connected to the call.

Ideogram â€“ ideogram.ai
â˜‘ A model to make images.
â˜‘ But Nano-Banana from Gemini stole the show...

âœ¦Â Â ğ—™ ğ—§ğ—œğ—˜ğ—¥Â Â âœ¦ 

Meta AI â€“ no real use cases.
Udio - Suno is better for music.
Copilot â€“ the worst LLM at everything.
Replit â€“ you have better options for vibecoding.
